description: Walk to End Alzheimers is one of our bigger opportunities where we run to raise money for Alzheimers reasearch.
Trash Bash was an older event we used to hold where we used to go around public places such as playgrounds and clean them up.
Mutts and Meows is an organization that helps care for stray cats and dogs while trying to find them homes.
Running with My Peeps is an event held in the spring where anyone can come and run a marathon. We help by setting up, handing out water during the event, and cleaning up.
We hold several bake sales throughout the year to raise money for LEDCON. They mainly consist of home baked goods.
At the end of the year we hold a pie social where we pie the previous officers and the upcoming officers.
